website_summaries.verdict: A cool looking and better performing reel that comes with a low price for the quality.
pros: Decent-sized handle, but not too large
A very dependable reel at a good price point
cons: This is a light reel, but not considered an ultralight

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way this reel looks and feels
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I really like the way this reel looks and feels. Pulled in a stripped base with no problem and the drag works nicely. Throws really well with light jigs. The extra large handle feels really nice when fishing for long period of time. I also love the zero reverse one way clutch bearing which gives me solid hooksets. I got the XY1000 with gear ratio of 5.1.1 which is plenty for me since I'm not looking to reel the fish in fast but to enjoy the moment of reeling them in. The 13+1BB makes the reeling very smooth and I can really enjoy the "fishing".
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several reels from Sougayalang, from 1000-4000. All these reels have 11 to 13 ball bearings. I can say without exaggeration they are the smoothest, most dependable reels I have ever used. The price is so much lower than competitors. I have caught pike, bass, steelhead, salmon and catfish using them. Great quality, amazing price!!!
customer_reviews.author: robert palmer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like A Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: After much deliberation, I purchased the Sougayilang XY400 as a replacement for another reel which quit working. I knew nothing about the brand, but saw some great reviews and the price was right. 1st, great shipping. received well be fore expected. 2nd, this appears to be a very solid reel - smooth as glass and construction appears very sound. I loaded with high quality braided line with a weighted hook and really look forward to catching my 1st Bass with this reel. First impression is this is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: One smooth spinning reel
customer_reviews.text: I loaded the real with braided 15 pound line and took it fishing. I've been out with it several times and it is one smooth spinning reel. The handle is larger than my other spinners, but I like it. It cast well, spins smoothly, the drag is smooth, and I love the instant stop one-way anti-reverse. I haven't weighed it, but it's light - I'm sure under 10 oz. I plan on purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: $ for $, worth it
customer_reviews.text: So, for the cost - probably 5 stars. But, against the field, not so much - so I meet in the middle with 4. Does run fairly smooth, drag included. However, there is some slop and it just does not "feel" like a top end reel. I am also not a fan of the big round grip on the handle. It works fine, just does not feel normal, or good. Having said all that, look at the price! For the price, she is a winner! Compared to high end gear, she comes up short. But, you know what you are getting when you buy it. 100% worth the money, and no issues using it on any fish.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No brainer
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, this is my second reel. Have always used Penn reels and been happy, tried this one just out of curiosity and it keeps up with my equal sized Penn. Don't know about longevity but at 1/3 to 1/4 cost of big name reels who cares. Have many friends look and hold and are impressed, even one who is a walleye guide loved this reel. Have had for over a year with no freshwater issues, haven't used in saltwater. Good, smooth functioning reel and drag. When Penn parts cost as much or more than this reel why not spend my hard earned money on this for less headache.
customer_reviews.author: Robert hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Paperwork Not Included
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several reels from this company and all seem like good quality and perform well for the price. I really like them. The downside of my purchases, Im not receiving any paperwork for any of them. No parts diagram at the minimum should be included. This could potentially be a problem down the road. Other then that, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At first comparable but...
customer_reviews.text: I first gave this 4 stars because it worked great and was smooth. But now that fishing season has started up and I have started catching big fish, the reel has broken at the line roller and is no longer usable or repairable. Guess there's not return or warranty after 3 months after purchase and use.
customer_reviews.author: handytoolman

customer_reviews.title: Great by for value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of the 1000 size for crappie fishing. Reels are great in my opinion. I own abu, lews, and shimano upper end ones as well and for $20 you can’t beat these! They cast great, handle is sweet, and with 15lb braid to get them out of the brush it winds it smooth and tight. No twisting and tangles. Only con is drag is on the weaker side unless you crank it all the way down but for crappie as pan fish it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs a tweak or two
customer_reviews.text: So, used this reel in conjunction with a viper 2 psun reel on a 2 day fishing trip. Smooth retrieve, pretty solid feeling reel (especially for the price). Here are the cons, the handle/knob on handle are too big/awkward in my opinion. 2,two, and maybe not even a con, the reel has a lower retrieval rate. I would not recommend this for spinner bait usuage because it is difficult to retrieve it fast enough to keep bait in the top water sweetspot. I would probably give this reel 3.5 stars, but rounding up to 4 because it feels solid and has a smooth retrieve for the money
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Finally. A 20$ dollar reel that is like a dream.Thank you guys for helping us blue collar guys with a darn good reel . Here's the proof. Been catching sunnies all afternoon till a Largemouth came along. Well this reel was no worries 👍.Love love love it!!!.. Again from all hard working Joe's like me. Thanks guys 👍✝️💜
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: It performs comparably
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and sturdy cast and retrieve. I've caught 2-4 pounder cats with ease while using the original spool with Sougaliyang 17 lb. test braided on a Medium rod tip and 2 pounder trouts using the spare spool with 6 lb test on a Medium Light rod tip. I'm not a pro but on a weekly basis pastime, this suits the price. I use Blakemore reel/line spray every use and I think it helps maintaining it well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando B. Fauni

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality for Money. Buy a Reel, not a Name.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my fifth reel from this company. I figure the Big Name Brands don't support my fishing addiction, so why get hung up on spending money on a name. I use these reels to build travel poles. Telescopic rods with lightweight reels. So far I am Very Impressed, and the action is Very comparable to my Penns, Abu Garcia, and Okuma rigs. I landed a 38lb Black Drum today on a spinner reel and an Ugly Stick.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Line holder will break
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully this come with a second spool because the line holder on the first spool broke first use... you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan gaige

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the smoothest reels I have ever used. The drag works well, it casts far and I actually like the big handle. My only concern is longevity - and I only question this because of the price. I did not rate the durability because I have only fished with it 6 times. I'll update if I have any issues. I use this for freshwater fishing only and have caught some largemouth bass, northern pike and a few walleyes. If this continues to perform as it is this summer, I will be upgrading a few of my Ice rods with this reel - although the smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: John Stark

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth well balance no vibration when cranking fast . The plus is the extra spool able to switch between 15 lb braid and 6 lb copolymer , good drag system easy to adjust on the fly has handled everything from 2 lb trout to a 3.5 bass and hopefully even bigger ! I don't know what you would get in a $150 reel that you don't have in this reel . I highly recommend this reel .
customer_reviews.author: esbm308

customer_reviews.title: Amazing reel fake graphite spool 1000 size
customer_reviews.text: 1000 SIZE REEL. Smooth as butter the reel quality is great and the extra spool is a nice add to the product. HOWEVER the quality of this "graphite spool" is poor and exactly like plastic if it is graphite of course. The problem others have stated when the line goes over the spool is non existent in my model the Eva foam grip is amazing for those who palm or full and the grip like a surf reel. I've caught 5 fish already with it and It performed great. I loaded the standard spool with 6lb fluro and the extra with 20lb braid for salt fun and both work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jack summerlin

customer_reviews.title: Like new after a full year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this reel for a little over a year now. I was impressed out of the box with the appearance and smooth action. Fast forward a year and I'm still incredibly impressed with it. I just got back from Colorado where I used this to fish rainbows for the weekend. I hauled in a dozen or more and it didn't skip a beat. If I had a knock at all it would be that the drag adjustment is a little finicky. Overall I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Reel! Excellent Company!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this reel for it being under $30. It shipped quick. The reel is incrediably smooth. It is heavier then I anticipated which is nice. My only complaint, and this is a personal preference deal, the handle knob is a little bit larger then Id prefer. However, it doesnt hinder its use. The company is amazing. They reached out to me to provide customer service and to check up on my shipment. I replied them with feedback and recieved an almost immediate response. I would reccomened this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these in different sizes and will probably buy a third soon. I have no compliants, very smooth spinning action, I haven't had any problems with backlashes going under the spools like the reels they replaced. I use the 1000 in my microlight rod with 4lb and 3000 on a medium with 10lb two to three days weekly for freshwater and inshore and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Better then "high quality reels"
customer_reviews.text: Really like this reel. When i received it i was very impressed with the looks. Only negative thing i have to say is the chrome part on the heel of the reel had a stripped out screw hole and the cover fell off. It didnt effect the functionality of this reel though. The drag is butter smooth amd cast great. I put the reel on a 5ft ultra light i use for crappie fishing under bridges. I have caught a few 5lb bass with it and the drag worked better then some of my $ 75 on up reels. I will be buying more to replace my worn out reels. Over all great product .
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Super value
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ultralights sense 1970 and have had dozens of reels thru the years. After checking this reel out and filling it with 10 lb power pro braided line, this reel is as smooth as any reel costing 3x as much. At first the handle seemed a little big, but after a few casts it was no problem, if fact I might like it more than the smaller handles, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Sporing

customer_reviews.title: Line lay needed work.
customer_reviews.text: *Updated*... Was contacted by the seller for a refund/return. At least they care enough to try and make it right. And aside from the spooling issue, which I fixed, it casts and reels smooth. Caught 2 bass last weekend with it.... Spooling it with line and noticed the line wasn't laying evenly across the spool. More at the back. Took the washer out and it helped a little bit but not near enough. Had to take a dremmel to the inside so spool so it dropped down further on the pin. Works good now!
customer_reviews.author: owen carroll

customer_reviews.title: My go to lightweight reel.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to reel. Everytime I buy another more expensive reel, I end up taking it off and putting this one back on. I have lost it down the river twice now, on top of having it roll around in the back of my truck. A little white lithium spray grease, and this thing stays smooth as butter. I like the gear ratio on this one and it holds quite a bit of line. I will buy another one if I ever manage to break this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This reel was a major disappointment. If they wouldve spent as much time correcting the functionality of the reel as they did on how it looks, it probably would be a decent reel. Handle on the reel randomly gets very hard to turn, the drag setting is just about worthless. All around subpar reel.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, even when disappointed. But, honestly, I am beyond disappointed. This reel would not spool up properly, no matter how I tried to lay out the various spacers it came with. Drag would tighten itself and the plastic spool snapped my braided line on nearly every cast. I have no idea if I just don’t get it or this reel just has some nuances to it. But, the reel I was replacing, the shakespeare uglystik GX2 reel that came on the pole, blows this crap away.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it zero stars. I excitededly opened my package and proceeded to crank it (as anybody would do with a new reel). It was buttery smooth.......for about 4 cranks. At that point it stiffened up considerably and the spool wouldn't even go up/down anymore. Do not waste your money!! It's already on it's way back same day as delivered, and I just ordered a Lew's like I should have done in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: LauraBeth

customer_reviews.title: Great bait catcher.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little reel. Great for catching my bluegill bait. Smooth and looks good. Spooled with 4lbs florocarbon.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Decent value, serves it's pirpise
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as my more expensive reels, doesn't feel as smooth, has play in the reeling action, but this after a few hundred silver bass earlier this year. I would definitely purchase again as a spare reel or a reel to loan out or to get someone turned on to fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony White

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: For the way it looki give it a 5 but quality and performance wise ill give it a 1star.. line dont even out on the reel theres a space top part of the reel.. after 1 day of using on a freshwater the smoothness was gone and when i opened it, it was rusty.. cant return it anymore coz tried it too late after i got it..
customer_reviews.author: JunS

customer_reviews.title: Best reel I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a light smoove casting easy to retrieve reel. I caught two nice bass the first day with it. I already own two Sougayilang reels and they are also great. I highly recommend Sougayilang products, great quality, great prices.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Maybe maybe not
customer_reviews.text: It is very smooth, but I kept getting a lot of knots in the line as I would cast. And the handle is now loose. And yes I have tightened the handle tension screw multiple times. Update the rod is binding up and getting hard to reel. I am getting tons of knots. Honestly I would like to have my money back or a replacement . UPDATE!! I have been contacted by the seller and they are sending me a replacement. So I’ve moved to 3 stars for the seller contacting me on their own. Will update once again once I test the new reel.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Salt Water
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, and receiving the reel, I was impressed with the feel and the value. After one morning of fishing it was evident with rust on screws, and the feel of the reel starting to seize up, this reel is not for Salt water as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Greenthumbum

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth, nice large handle.
customer_reviews.text: I have not fished the reel yet, so I can't comment on it;s performance. However, as a registered guide, I'm already impressed with the smoothness of the reel and especially like the enlarged reel handle, especially for someone with big hands. I will return to comment after my first trip with the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Guide Bob

customer_reviews.title: very smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have been fishing for 60 years. I have never had this smooth of a reel. it feels great in your hand and the drag is awesome. I ordered two more today, one for my son and a 2000 series for me. the price is unbelievable for such a great product. the anti reverse is immediate. I can't say enough about it. just give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: clifford r hagen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful reel. Solid feel. Smooth operation.
customer_reviews.text: I like it already. I filled both spools with line and everything went on smooth and evenly. The reel feels solid and I believe it will be as good as any American made reel. I gave it 5 stars but if anything breaks too soon, I will post an update. I doubt I will need it.
customer_reviews.author: hombre243Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great reel. I have all high end reels
customer_reviews.text: Great reel. I have all high end reels. Recently I purchased reels here in Florida fishing products. I think these reels are produced in the same facility. Looks identical, a couple suttlle changes, feels the same. The price for those are 179.00 average. So I'm hoping the performance is the same
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed... bought for a salmon trip after all the great reviews it had. The drag did not work so many fish were lost and that made my salmon trip a bust.I can't be to mad it was $33 and that's what I got. Next time won't wait last minute to buy a reel but I did have higher expectations after reviews. Hope the next purchaser has better luck
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value reel.
customer_reviews.text: Worked real well on my 8 ft. Spinning rod. The nob on the crank is bigger than other reels I own, but that is OK. The reel appears well fit together and finished. The extra graphite spool a plus. No fish to test the drag yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne K Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Okay reel, but this reel is corrodes easily if it gets wet. I had all of the screws rust on me after about three uses. Also, the spool knob has begun to rust on the inside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I've gone bay fishing 5 times now with this reel off my kayak. It's gotten wet and at one time dunked in sea water and tp this day is still in perfect working condition. Reel spins as smooth as the day I took it out of the box. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: rhaudell cordova

customer_reviews.title: Sougayilang 4000 and 10 pound Yozuri hybrid line
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this fishing reel. I tested it out recently and it performed way beyond expectation. First cast I made I caught a 2.5 foot alligator gar and the reel handled it withouth any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Planning on buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this reel looks and feels. There is nothing cheap looking about it. In my opinion if it was bought in a big box store with a big company name it feels and looks like it would be at least a $149.99 reel.. i haven't had mine long enough and only used it one time so i cant give it a durability rating yet but will rate it again later.. so far i would definitely buy more though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression is favorable
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression is favorable, fit and finish is as good as reels costing 4 times as much. Line comes off the spool and winds up even and smooth. Weighs more than some of the competitors but not objectionable. Visually upon initial inspection the bearings and main shaft should be a bit heavier but performance with a large fish will tell the quality.
customer_reviews.author: walter greer

customer_reviews.title: screws rust after first time fishing.
customer_reviews.text: THE REEL IS VERY SMOOTH , GOOD DRAG , SEEMS WELL BUILT BUT ALL THE SCREWS RUSTED AFTER FIRST TIME OUT. THIS WOULD MAKE ME BELIEVE THAT IF THIS COMPANY WAS SO CARLESS OR COST CONSCIOUS ABOUT A LITTLE THING LIKE $2.00 WORTH OF STAINLESS SCREWS THAT THE REST OF THIS REEL HAS THE SAME LACK OF QUALITY. TOO BAD BECAUSE WITH A LITTLE MORE CARE THIS COULD HAVE BEEN A REEL I WOULD HAVE BOUGHT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not light but not bad
customer_reviews.text: This thing weighs more than 3 cinderblocks but it's built tough like that too. I didn't like the bulbous handle knob. The price was right and I donated it to a kids fishing class.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mihara

customer_reviews.title: Strong ultra light reel that I’m very pleased with.
customer_reviews.text: Received my new XY1000 spinning reel yesterday and after filling it with 6# monofilament took it fishing today. I love this reel. Smooth casting with easy to set drag, caught several trout and just can’t recommend it highly enough. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Loooks and performs really well.
customer_reviews.text: I received my reel yesterday, added a 10 pound test and took it out back to see how it performed within less than 15 minutes I caught to large bass. The reel performed exceptional. The cast and retrieval is smooth and the brake holds very well and for the price, it's well worth the purchase. I'm taking it salt water fishing over the weekend. In my opinion, this would be a nice reel for your collection. Mila/ Florida
customer_reviews.author: Mila L. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Reel for a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I'd say it's on par with similar models from KastKing. Yeah, they're knockoffs of Diawa/Shimano, but sturdy units. I'm retired, so I can't afford models from, "The Big Boyz."
customer_reviews.author: Sandstone

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very light and smooth. I was really pleased with how this reel performs. Not sure how it will compare to my Shimano and Daiwa reels that have caught thousands of fish but so for I like how light the body is and how smooth the drag is.
customer_reviews.author: FISHUNT7

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty small. The bell doesn't hold much line so mot good for larger fish. Made for pan fish and fresh water. It s not good in salt water.
customer_reviews.author: Ms I

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, durable, great reel for the price
customer_reviews.text: This reel is so smooth. I have had way more expensive reels and this stacks up against them. I really like the extra ball bearing so there is no back play in the reel. It feels very well built and is great value for the price. Idk how they’re selling it for this price
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Great price and performance
customer_reviews.text: It performs very well! I love the feel of this reel. I use this at the pier and go ocean fishing. Its constructed nicely. Thank you for a great real. Great price for a decent reel!
customer_reviews.author: Conner Castro

customer_reviews.title: Have ordered before with no issues
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this brand before and liked the product. This particular reel does not function properly. the line does not spool correctly, stacks up unevenly. I missed the return by date, so I still have it.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOW QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's terrible! The drag feels like it's a $2 reel. Everything about it feels cheap. Bird nested on me every cast. Utterly terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Warsi

customer_reviews.title: Left handed fishing pole
customer_reviews.text: This is a left handed fishing reel wh Ishmael I'd have known before I purchased , I used it yesterday for the first time it works well just a lefty.... I like right handed fishing poles
customer_reviews.author: rel

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic reel for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Really nice reel for the price - compares to reels in the $100 - $150 range. Very smooth, long casts and bail flips back nicely. Outstanding value if this reel holds up. I wasn't sure about the handle but it is very comfortable. I'm very picky about performance but this reel delivers! Very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy V

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: smooth casting. Good drag and holds enough line for anything you fish for at a price that dosen't brake the bank
customer_reviews.author: chicago lou

customer_reviews.title: NICE REEL
customer_reviews.text: Used several times now, excellent reel, especially at the price paid. Can't beat it. If you only get one season from it , still a great value, but I expect years of use from it. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Billy W.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I fish 2 to 3 times a week, everything from bass to snook, since I live in Florida. I bought this reel about 4 months ago and have had a single issue in salt or fresh water. The little 1000 has can really hang with the big dogs. I'm really meticulous about the care of my gear so all of it is washed after every trip, salt or fresh. I run it with 20lb or 10lb power pro and the performance has been flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell R Svensson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a couple months walleye fishing. Works well. Drags are smooth. Caught a number of 24” and 28” walleyes and the reel performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price it looked good but after a week of using it and I fish brackish water and fresh clean my pole after every use found the screws rusting replaced with stainless will have to see where from there
customer_reviews.author: wm St.pete

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid fisherman and decided to wait before i reviewed this one..... took this out 8x in about 2 weeks and for the most part has withstood pretty well. The only thing I've been disappointed in is the clicking sound that came after the 5th trip. I typically use an Abu but wanted something for a light pole when i jigg under bridges, over all it's doing what i need it to. Smooth casting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 👏
customer_reviews.text: I have had the opportunity to use many different brands of reels from Abu Garcia,13 Pflueger and others. This reel is not only functional and durable but thank you for the extras sougayilang added to make this reel a 1st choice in my boat!
customer_reviews.author: Billy v

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: I’m exclusive shimano but thought I’d give these reels a try. Bought four models. Reels work smoothly and function well. The 2000 model spare spool will only fit with spindle bearing removed. This is not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wili

customer_reviews.title: I dont get how these are so inexpensive on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: For a spinning reel I would compare this reel to a $50-80 spinning reel. Paired with a 6"0 ugly stik gx2 and 8lb. Trilene 100% fluorocarbon line I can pull out anything in the lakes and rivers in my area no prob. From 1lb. lake trout to 12lb. Catfish and Striper in the river. Solid and comfortable reel overall.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Barr

customer_reviews.title: Great for sub 10lb fish
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, really good looking. Great when using it for 5lb bass or anything around that range (the 2000 model) but the handle and shaft part of the handle literally snapped when using it for large striped bass today. I shoupdnt been using a larger reel, I get it, it broke because of me. But its just a warning. Dont go for big fish with the smaller reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used it for the first time today, worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth retrieval, lightweight, zero slop in instant anti-reverse... an excellent reel so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Reilley

customer_reviews.title: Good reel
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this reel for a couple of years now. The drag is a little bumpy now and the screws are a bit rusty now. Other than that it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sealumber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing surprise for a lightweight reel!
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish, frame size and smoothness of this reel will make an excellent addition to my stock... mating it to a higher end Bass Pro rod for a great ultralight combo. Will be buying mire if these for friends and family. On the water at least 70 days a year in northern Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Light and feels good and great price. The reason I gave it a 1 for durability is I have not used it enough but when I do I’ll let you know!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The reel is great. I got the 5000 series and it handles ...
customer_reviews.text: The reel is great. I got the 5000 series and it handles the large fish great. Smooth operating, great drag, and I have an extra spool to switch line types when needed. Very pleased. I got this to go on a medium heavy rod and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Billiter

customer_reviews.title: Cheap mass produced junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheaply made reel. The knob on the side was sprung almost immediately with very light tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Reel seems to be well made and a very good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Reel seems to be well made and a very good deal for the money. I have rated it at 4 stars instead of five because I have only used it much yet...if it still works as well in a year as it does today I will change my review to 5 stars. I have the 1000 size. Plan to use it freshwater only...mostly for crappie and the occasional bass that couldn't turn down a crappie jig. After fishing with it once I do plan to purchase another one in the near future as well as one in a larger size for bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good words to say about this reel .I will buy it again. 5- Stars.
customer_reviews.author: b.johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/Lightweight however probably not the best for saltwater!
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm, well yes it’s cheap and lightweight; however, there’s two key weak points that saltwater will eat the internals up! 1. Where the handle meets the body is loose and doesn’t provide a good seal. 2. The spool stem raises too high along with the nice looking spool will allow saltwater penetrations well as #1!
customer_reviews.author: David Griffen

customer_reviews.title: Great reel!
customer_reviews.text: Its super silent and seems to perform as good as my friends who's been fishing for years.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Wowser.
customer_reviews.text: Today I went fishing for catfish and snagged a striper. I know it was a striper because of the scale it left on the hook and by the way it ran. I have hooked them before and they can fight. I felt like it was not a legal fish 10 to 12 inches however I was sure I could have landed it but it jumped off the hook before I could land it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Wickliffe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just got the reel yesterday. I’m impressed with the smooth action of the reel and the quality. Will see how it hold up with actual use, so far I’m happy about my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chago65

customer_reviews.title: very smooth, reliable
customer_reviews.text: I HATE the handle, it's like holding a golf ball, it's too da*n big!
customer_reviews.author: Gandolf

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and functional!
customer_reviews.text: My assement is premature...since I have just received it on the 1st of July...I've placed some backing on the reel and will soon load some 14# monofilament on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and broken
customer_reviews.text: The reel came without a box, wrapped in just plastic and stuffed in an envelope. As pictures show it came with pieces already rusted on the spool. The reel wouldn’t crank to the point I had to look to see if something was actually stopping it from moving. This is the worst item I’ve ever purchased on Amazon. Immediate return. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph V.

customer_reviews.title: intended to put a finer line on the spare spool for fresh water fishing
customer_reviews.text: The spare spool does not wind evenly, More line at bottom and no line on top of spool, intended to put a finer line on the spare spool for fresh water fishing. The spare spool is trash. The appearance of the reel looks good though.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC LEE

customer_reviews.title: I loved it I order 2 more
customer_reviews.text: I loved it I order 2 more...Will probably order several more here very soon. The Bearings and very smooth. Love the big handle for a more relax retrieval.
customer_reviews.author: SLIXX

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once and now it gets stuck when you are reeling it figure the return window in closed you pay for what you get cheap China crap I'll see how the others work
customer_reviews.author: Dana Barbrow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel for the Money works as well as my high prices Shimanos
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great surprise . I have two of there reels now and in comparison to my shamanism they are just as good . Super smooth drag ZERO anti reverse . 6lb test and 3-5 smallies not a problem .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the light weight and smoothness of the reel
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight and smoothness of the reel. I loved the price. I am puzzled how a reel of this apparent quality can be purchased for such a low price! I haven't tried the reel for fishing yet, but comparing it to some of my more expensive reels, it appears to be as comparable for a much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: You get what pay for. The handle wobbles. It probably good use for light tackle fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Jobar

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Great reels and love that they come with an extra spool so i can use for different fishing trips without having to spool new line every time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth reel for the money extra spool a nice bonus
customer_reviews.author: robert rench

customer_reviews.title: Quality reel nice ball feel
customer_reviews.text: Love the ball-shape handle , balls feel great in the palm, nice and squishy
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmin o

customer_reviews.title: i really like this reel
customer_reviews.text: i really like this reel. nice and firm no give anywhere. but i was under the impression from the pics that the extra spool was metal WRONG its plastic. and it wasnt even round, it was an oval. but tother than that i like it
customer_reviews.author: Ausky5

customer_reviews.title: I did however go fishing last night and it performs so far like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Ive rated this product 4 stars because ive not caught a fish using it being that I just put it on a Berkley cherry wood last night on 5/27/18. I did however go fishing last night and it performs so far like a dream. Its light , smooth , good construction and good-looking . I have 8 pound mono on it now and it does great .I would buy again . most of the time you get what you pay for and this jewel has surprised me.the over sized grip I like as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From what I can tell so far it seems like a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Reel showed up well packed. I am only leaving 4 stars because I haven't fished with it yet . From what I can tell so far it seems like a quality product. Reels smooth and the bail closes firmly . Will need to catch some fish to see how the drag is and will update this review in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Feels Like a Much More Expensive Reel
customer_reviews.text: This reel looks and feels like a much more expensive reel. I have no regrets about this purchase and may buy another one in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, line kept getting tangled. Nut on ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, line kept getting tangled. Nut on handle also fell off after casting. Handle came out, and never found the nut
customer_reviews.author: ABud1018

customer_reviews.title: Great buy so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's been great. Caught alot of decent bass on it with no problem. it's very smooth and I like the handle. I reccomend it at 20 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Cpl wilson usmc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy
customer_reviews.text: Though this would be lesser quality I was wrong. Took a chance and it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: King Watt

customer_reviews.title: Not aluminium frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4000 model and I was led to believe it had an aluminium body. It does not. The frame is plastic. Otherwise it's a decent reel that i think i paid about $10 too much four. Could have been worse.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL B.

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB REEL FOR THE VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product for great value! Highly recommend this reel. So smooth and quality craftsmanship! Effortless cranking with a good 4 lb' bass on the other end! You gotta get one of these reels!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

product_meta.title: Sougayilang Fishing Reel 13+1BB Light Weight Ultra Smooth Aluminum Spinning Fishing Reel with Free Spare Graphite Spool
feature_bullets: SMOOTH - 13+1 Sougayilang spinning fishing reel corrosion resistant smooth ball bearings and one instant stop one-way anti-reverse bearing give it ultra-smooth performance. and comes with an extra free spare spool!

STRONG - Sougayilang spinning reels are equipped with: precision brass gears, hardened metal main shaft, triple disc carbon drag washers, and interchangeable right or left CNC machined aluminum handle.

HIGH POWERED - Sougayilang spinning reel’s Superior Drag System offers incredible stopping power. It has a hardened metal main shaft, perfect mesh drive gear and precision machined pinion gear for fish fighting power.

LIGHT WEIGHT - Hollow frame design and computer balancing system combined with high performance and light weight for long time fishing.this fishing reel is an awesome gift for experienced and beginner.
Position - Ocean boat fishing, ocean rock fishing, ocean beach fishing, lake, river, reservoir pond, stream etc.
